about_the_game:
Family holiday turned into a bloody nightmare

A man named George returns to his parents' house after many, many years. They stopped communicating when the guy was 18 years old and he ran away from home, but on the eve of Christmas and New Year, George receives a letter of invitation from his parents. They invite him to return, celebrate the holidays together and reconcile. If George had known what a nightmare awaited him, he would never have agreed to return to his childhood home...

"Evil Holiday" is not just another indie horror game. In this game, horror is turned up to the maximum, and the chilling scenes will forever be remembered by even the most experienced player.

The developer of this game almost went crazy when he tried to transfer the story of an ordinary American family into the world of a computer game, because all the horror that a person playing Evil Holiday has to endure cannot be described in words. This is scary! This is creepy! It will come to you in the form of nightmares!

Average game completion time - 40 minutes.

About the game:

The action will take place in the country house of the main character's parents and on a small snowy street. Also, from time to time you will plunge into the past to understand why all the horrors of the present began to happen right now. In the game, the atmosphere of fear appears gradually, because at first George enjoys the upcoming holiday, and then slowly finds himself in his own nightmare from which he can no longer get out alive. You will scream in fear and horror while playing this game and believe me, you are guaranteed long nights without sleep.

Epileptic seizures associated with increased sensitivity to light are possible. Some people may experience seizures when exposed to flashes of light and flashing images that appear in video games. People who have not previously experienced such seizures may not be aware of their illness. A reasonable restriction of the gaming audience is recommended.

b]Game Features:[/b]

- A creepy and detailed atmosphere of fear and horror.

- Complete immersion - first into the holiday atmosphere, then into wild horror

- Excellent music and sound accompaniment - on the verge of realism.

- The 80s soundtrack adds even more charm to the story.

- There is a very brutal murder scene in the game. You will remember her forever.

- After beating the game, you'll want to call your parents.

DESCRIPTION OF CONTENT FOR ADULTS

The developers describe the content like this:

The game contains images of scenes of violence that can have a negative impact on the psyche. Some content items may not be suitable for certain age groups. A reasonable restriction of the audience of the game is recommended.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of violence and cruelty. There is blood, killing of living beings, people and animals, and there is also a psychological effect on the psyche. There are scary and sharp moments that can frighten the player and throw him out of balance.
